description: BRA/08/023 - Biodiversity Conservation and Promotion of Social and Environmental Development

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: The objective of this project is to promote the strengthening of Conservation Units as a tool for conservation and sustainable use of biodiversity. The project will achieve this through the following 6 Outcomes and their related Outputs: (i) Federal Conservation Units managed, (ii) Traditional Peoples Organizations for the Sustainable Use of Renewable Natural Resources Strengthened Federal Conservation Units, (iii) Establish Mechanisms for Biodiversity Research and Conservation, (iv) Federal Conservation Units protected, (v) Responsible Tourism and integrated into the socio-cultural diversity, traditional knowledge and biodiversity conservation developed and (vi) Capacity Building for Promoting the Development of Actions Related to Federal Conservation Units.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: BRA/08/023-Biodiversity Conser
